metadata.name: C2A Networking Behavior Scale
metadata.authors: ThriveIEP / LE3 (adapted from Wolff & Moser SNBS framework)
metadata.citation: ThriveIEP. (2026). C2A Networking Behavior Scale (C2A-NBS-6). Based on Wolff, H. G., & Moser, K. (2009). Effects of networking on career success. Journal of Applied Psychology, 94, 196–206; Wolff, H. G., & Spurk, D. (2020). Developing and validating a short networking behavior scale. Journal of Career Assessment, 28, 277–299.
metadata.license: Original scale developed by ThriveIEP for C2A battery. Framework adapted from SNBS (Wolff & Moser, 2009; Wolff & Spurk, 2020).
metadata.stem: Please indicate how often you have done each of the following in the past month.

items.text: In the past month, how often have you started a conversation with someone new in your program, school, or workplace to get to know them?
In the past month, how often have you reached out to a classmate, coworker, or colleague you haven't spoken to in a while to stay in touch?
In the past month, how often have you asked someone in your program or workplace for advice, information, or help with a challenge you faced?
In the past month, how often have you introduced yourself to someone outside your program or workplace because they could be a useful professional contact?
In the past month, how often have you followed up with someone you met at an event, workshop, or professional setting to keep the connection going?
In the past month, how often have you reached out to someone outside your program or workplace to ask for advice, information, or an introduction to someone they know?

validation.sample_description: Pilot instrument — no published validation data. Initial target α ≥ .65, refinement target α ≥ .70. Based on SNBS six-cell model (internal/external × building/maintaining/using) which shows robust factor structure (Wolff & Moser, 2009; Wolff & Spurk, 2020).
